header.title: Invest in Real Estate with as little as 5,000 EGP
header.description: Nesba is the first fractional real estate solution coming to Egypt allowing you to invest in real estate through property fractionalization.
header.waitlistPrompt: Join our waitlist to get exclusive access to our initial offerings.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.subtitle: Build your real estate investment portfolio with a few clicks

browse.title: Browse
browse.heading: Access first class real estate with different developers
browse.description: Explore our collection of properties, vetted by real estate experts.

invest.title: Invest
invest.heading: Claim the nesba you love, from only 5000 EGP
invest.description: Buy as many shares as you want in your favourite property with no hidden fees, directly in our platform.

earn.title: Earn
earn.heading: Enjoy as your wealth grows through capital appreciation
earn.description: Relax and watch as your shares increase in price and provide you with currency hedged ROI.
earn.extraNote: Paid directly to your NESBA wallet

sell.title: Sell
sell.heading: Liquidate whenever you need to
sell.description: Exit your investments through our secondary markets or during our final Exit for each property at a set date.
sell.extraNote: Paid directly to your NESBA wallet

form.heading: Get notified as soon as we launch
